name: pixilate
effect: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into fairy moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
short_effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into fairy moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
